body.p: An entity issues a stop-loss contract to an employer (the policyholder). The contract provides health coverage for the policyholder’s employees and has the following features:

li.p: insurance coverage of 100 per cent for the aggregate claims from employees exceeding CU25 million (the ‘stop-loss threshold’). The employer will self-insure claims from employees up to CU25 million.

claims processing services for employees’ claims during the next year, regardless of whether the claims have passed the stop-loss threshold of CU25 million. The entity is responsible for processing the health insurance claims of the employees on behalf of the employer.
